title: How to Kill an Epic Creature on Spore

steps.headline: Get your pack and summon flock (if you were an omnivore in the cell stage).
steps.description: Make sure you have full health, max speed,spit, and other abilities such as charge.

steps.headline: Make a route where there'll be a lot of food for you to recharge health and hunger.
Spit poison at the epic creature and your pack/flock will start attacking.
steps.description: (It is best to save at this point). Join in by charging at the creature and occasionally backing up to spit.If you die,just quit and and go back to where you saved. Eventually, all of your pack/flock members would have died. If the epic creature's health is below 700 continue, but if it is above that, it is best to start over.

steps.headline: Walk backwards and spit as you walk.
steps.description: It might take a while, but you have to keep doing this until it is dead. If that doesn't work, keep walking backwards and spitting until you can resummon flock. While they attack it, eat and heal yourself, then join in!

steps.headline: Be glad!
steps.description: You just killed the hardest creature on Spore! If you are a carnivore/omnivore, enjoy your meal!

steps.headline: Quit and make a new world.
Pick the strongest creature.
steps.description: Click on the "Aim" thing. Sometimes you can be an epic.

steps.headline: Make sure you have social stuff.
Ally with a gecko criminoso (Portuguese name).
steps.description: It has 250 health. Use its DNA points to evolve social.

steps.headline: Make allies with creatures with health 25+.
Spit at the epic.
steps.description: Your allies will attack it and you just keep spitting while they fight. Note: The gecko has 250 health. If you do it close to an ally nest, you can lure the epic there and you and the gecko will heal.

steps.headline: Keep on going backwards, leading the Epic Creature away from it spitting fire at you.
steps.description: Constantly shoot the laser at it.

steps.headline: Another way in Space Stage is to get turrets from your city to try to attack it.
steps.description: However, this method will endanger your city, and it may even be destroyed. Beware.
